name: eXceed Gun Bullet Children
summary: Humanity is at war against vampires and deviants. Mankind’s last line of defense is a group of children trained to wield powerful magic that can rival the demonic hordes, but at the cost of most of their lifespan. Likened to bullets of a gun, they are known as the ‘Gun Bullet Children’. The time is NOW! A vampire invasion force has been detected in the airspace above Tokyo Portal 5. Preliminary reports indicate over 500 vampires and accompanying Killings Dolls with reinforcing hordes of deviant humans. The first line of defenses has been obliterated and the Gun Bullet Children are scrambled to launch a counter-assault and stop the invasion.

esrb.synopsis: This is an action game in which players guide flying human-like characters through vertically scrolling levels. As players navigate across the screen, they fire magical projectiles, bombs, and energy blasts at vampires and boss enemies. The somewhat frenetic combat is accompanied by battle cries and colorful explosions; enemies disappear when defeated. A handful of female characters are depicted in form-fitting outfits that accentuate their chests.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 7 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards fantasy characters - Non realistic looking violence towards characters which although human are not very detailed
